00016 
00017 package WeBWorK::HTML::ScrollingRecordList;
00018 use base qw(Exporter);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::HTML::ScrollingRecordList - HTML widget for a scrolling list of
00023 records.
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 use Carp;
00030 use WeBWorK::Utils::FormatRecords qw/getFormatsForClass formatRecords/;
00031 use WeBWorK::Utils::SortRecords qw/getSortsForClass sortRecords/;
00032 use WeBWorK::Utils::FilterRecords qw/getFiltersForClass filterRecords/;
00033 
00034 our @EXPORT    = ();
00035 our @EXPORT_OK = qw(
00036     scrollingRecordList
00037 );
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 sub scrollingRecordList {
00042     my ($options, @Records) = @_;
00043     
00044     my %options = (default_filters=>[],default_sort=>"",default_format=>"",%$options);
00045     # %options must contain:
00046     #  name - name of scrolling list -- use $r->param("$name")
00047     #  request - the WeBWorK::Request object for the current request
00048     # may contain:
00049     #  default_sort - name of sort to use by default
00050     #  default_format - name of format to use by default
00051     #  default_filter - listref, names of filters to apply by default (unimpl.)
00052     #  allowed_filters - hashref, mapping field name to list of allowed values (unimpl.)
00053     #  size - number of rows shown in scrolling list
00054     #  multiple - are multiple selections allowed?
00055     
00056     croak "name not found in options" unless exists $options{name};
00057     croak "request not found in options" unless exists $options{request};
00058     my $name = $options{name};
00059     my $r = $options{request};
00060     
00061     my $default_sort = $options{default_sort} || "";
00062     my $default_format = $options{default_format} || "";
00063 
00064     my @default_filters = @{$options{default_filters}} ;
00065 
00066     my $size = $options{size};
00067     my $multiple = $options{multiple};
00068     
00069     my $sorts = [];
00070     my $sort_labels = {};
00071     my $selected_sort = "";
00072     
00073     my $formats = [];
00074     my $format_labels = {};
00075     my $selected_format = "";
00076     
00077     my $filters = [];
00078     my $filter_labels = {};
00079     my @selected_filters= ();
00080     
00081     my @ids = ();
00082     my %labels = ();
00083     
00084     my $refresh_button_name    = defined($options{refresh_button_name}) ? $options{refresh_button_name}:"Change Display Settings";
00085     
00086     my @selected_records = $r->param("$name");
00087 
00088     if (@Records) {
00089         my $class = ref $Records[0];
00090 
00091         ($filters, $filter_labels) = getFiltersForClass(@Records);
00092         if (defined $r->param("$name!filter")){
00093             @selected_filters = $r->param("$name!filter");
00094             @selected_filters = ("all") unless @selected_filters;
00095         }
00096         else {
00097             @selected_filters = @default_filters;
00098         }
00099     
00100         ($sorts, $sort_labels) = getSortsForClass($class);
00101         $selected_sort = $r->param("$name!sort")
00102             || $default_sort
00103             || (@$sorts ? $sorts->[0] : "");
00104         
00105         ($formats, $format_labels) = getFormatsForClass($class);
00106         $selected_format = $r->param("$name!format")
00107             || $default_format
00108             || (@$formats ? $formats->[0] : "");
00109         
00110         @Records = filterRecords({filter=>\@selected_filters},@Records);
00111         
00112         @Records = sortRecords({preset=>$selected_sort}, @Records);
00113         
00114         # generate IDs from keyfields
00115         my @keyfields = $class->KEYFIELDS;
00116         foreach my $Record (@Records) {
00117             push @ids, join("!", map { $Record->$_ } @keyfields);
00118         }
00119         
00120         # generate labels hash
00121         @labels{@ids} = @Records;
00122         %labels = formatRecords({preset=>$selected_format}, %labels);
00123     }
00124     
00125     my %sort_popup_options = (
00126         -name => "$name!sort",
00127         -values => $sorts,
00128         -default => $selected_sort,
00129         -labels => $sort_labels,
00130     );
00131     
00132     my %format_popup_options = (
00133         -name => "$name!format",
00134         -values => $formats,
00135         -default => $selected_format,
00136         -labels => $format_labels,
00137     );
00138 
00139     my %filter_options = (
00140         -name => "$name!filter",
00141         -values => $filters,
00142         -default => \@selected_filters,
00143         -labels => $filter_labels,
00144         -size => 5,
00145         -multiple => 1,
00146     );
00147 
00148     my %list_options = (
00149         -class=>"ScrollingRecordList",
00150         -name => "$name",
00151         -values => \@ids,
00152         -default => \@selected_records,
00153         -labels => \%labels,
00154     );
00155     $list_options{-size} = $size if $size;
00156     $list_options{-multiple} = $multiple if $multiple;
00157     
00158     return CGI::div({-class=>"ScrollingRecordList"},
00159            CGI::table({-border=>0, -cellspacing=>0, -cellpadding=>0},
00160               CGI::Tr({valign=>"top"},[
00161            CGI::td({-align=>"right"},"Sort:&nbsp;").
00162            CGI::td(CGI::popup_menu(%sort_popup_options)),
00163 
00164            CGI::td({-align=>"right"},"Format:&nbsp;").
00165            CGI::td(CGI::popup_menu(%format_popup_options)),
00166 
00167            CGI::td({-align=>"right"},"Filter:&nbsp;").
00168            CGI::td(CGI::scrolling_list(%filter_options)),
00169          ]),
00170            ),
00171            CGI::submit(-name=>"$name!refresh", -label=>$refresh_button_name), CGI::br(),
00172            CGI::scrolling_list(%list_options),
00173        );
00174 }
00175 
00176 1;
Generated on Fri Jun 8 22:55:35 2012 for WeBWorK2 by  1.6.3
